title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4111.17 - Racing after scratch
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4111.17 - Racing after scratch

State Regulations

No horse, having previously been scratched from a race on
certification of unfitness by the State veterinarian, may be accepted for
racing at a licensed harness race track unless the State veterinarian certifies
that such horse is currently fit to race. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4111.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
